analytics.title: Usage Data
analytics.label: Usage Data
analytics.description: Select the usage data option to help us improve Redis Insight. We use such usage data to understand how Redis Insight features are used, prioritize new features, and enhance the user experience.

notifications.title: Notification
notifications.label: Show notification
notifications.description: Select to display notification. Otherwise, notifications are shown in the Notification Center.

eula.title: Server Side Public License
eula.label: I have read and understood the Terms
eula.requiredText: Accept the Server Side Public License

true.title: Encryption
true.label: Encrypt sensitive information
true.description: Select to encrypt sensitive information using system keychain. Otherwise, this information is stored locally in plain text, which may incur security risk.

false.title: Encryption
false.label: Encrypt sensitive information
false.description: Install or enable the system keychain to encrypt and securely store your sensitive information added before using the application. Otherwise, this information will be stored locally in plain text and may lead to security risks.
